definition: to insert/stick in/pierce/to take part in/to interfere/to interpose
"hand" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 64), occurring in 提, 把, 打 etc
to separate the grain from the husk
slot
to insert/to stick/to thrust
to insert/to take turns, alternate/to interweave/to interlace/subplot/interlude/episode/(military) to thrust deep into the enemy forces
music played during a movie, play etc/incidental music/music played in a theatrical interlude/(fig.) incident/episode
to get involved in/to meddle/interference
socket/outlet
jack/socket
illustration
to cut in line/to jump a queue/to live on a rural community (during the Cultural Revolution)
plug
flower arranging/ikebana
to interrupt (sb speaking)/interruption/digression
to interrupt (a radio or TV program) with a commercial insert, breaking news etc/to put a call on hold
to place in a certain position/to assign to a job/to plant/resettlement (old)
lit. to see a gap and stick in a needle (idiom); fig. to make use of every second and every inch

sentences.english: Roofless towers appeared and disappeared, thrusting blindly upward.
sentences.chinese: 無頂的塔不斷顯現又隱匿，盲目的直插雲霄。

sentences.english: Jiao body red drapery Cui lid, up put Long Feng to show lucky omen, four the angles hang silk Sui.
sentences.chinese: 轎身紅幔翠蓋，上面插龍鳳呈祥，四角掛着絲穗。

sentences.english: A knife was plunged up to the hilt in Rita's left breast.
sentences.chinese: 一把短刀齊柄直插在麗達的左胸上。

sentences.english: Insert it in the foam while it drys .
She broke in: "You've really been to Russia?"
sentences.chinese: 她插了一句，“你真的去俄羅斯了？”

sentences.english: It is improper to cut in on a queue.
sentences.chinese: 突然插到排隊的行列中去是不恰當的。

sentences.english: I am about to give you slide show when outlet is pulled.
sentences.chinese: 一節課我就要給出幻燈時，忽然插被拉下。

sentences.english: If you choose to validate documents, you typically validate at insert time.
sentences.chinese: 如果選擇驗證文檔，那麼通常是在插入時進行驗證。

sentences.english: Chapter 3 treats the design of the timing synchronization loop.
sentences.chinese: 第三章講述了基於內插思想的同步環路設計。

sentences.english: You can even slip them into the wall to build a step shelf-like design.
sentences.chinese: 你甚至可以把它們插到牆壁裏變成一個階梯式的架子。

sentences.english: Instead, disconnect and immediately reconnect the power cord.
sentences.chinese: 而是，先拔下電源線後立即再插上電源線。

sentences.english: Tiki torches were mounted in the snowbanks leading to the house.
sentences.chinese: 他們在通往房間的雪堆中插上了提基火把。

sentences.english: He saw a dagger sticking in his car's tyre.
sentences.chinese: 他看到一把匕首插在他汽車的輪胎上。

sentences.english: Who is there here with a bold heart? Who will plant the flag on the barricade again?
sentences.chinese: 這兒誰有膽量再把這面紅旗插到街壘上去？

sentences.english: He waits for the sound of my key in the lock.
sentences.chinese: 他等待着我把鑰匙插到鑰匙眼裏的聲音。

sentences.english: The little girl wore a red flower in her hair.
sentences.chinese: 小女孩在她的頭上插了一朵紅花。
